blog.title: What is Empower Access App
blog.content: Employment for persons with disabilities is a great challenge country wide.  Persons with disabilities have a lack of job opportunities due to inaccessible jobs sites. Users lack control of having accessible job sites as well as feedback output from potential employers and jobs in general
